com.dodgydive

Class Diver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dodgydive.Diver

  • public class Diver
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that draws and updates the diver character that the player is in control of while playing the game.
    Author:
    Damian Jimenez, jimenez.dmn@gmail.com
    Maurice Harris, maurice.harris@mavs.uta.edu
    Neunzo Vincent, neunzo.thomas@mavs.uta.edu
    Craig Lautenslager, craig.lautenslager@mavs.uta.edu

    • Constructor Detail

      • Diver

        public Diver(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion diverTexture,
             com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion deathTexture)
        Constructor method for the class. Set's up the diver instance and set's the texture that will be used to display the diver, as well as creating the animation and collision rectangle for the diver.
        Parameters:
        diverTexture - Texture for the diver while they are alive
        deathTexture - Texture for the diver when they die (unused)

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        Updates the position of the diver.
        Parameters:
        delta - float that will be used to update the animation timer.

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(float x,
                        float y)
        Sets the position of the diver and its collision rectangle
        Parameters:
        x - float value to be used to set the x-position of the diver
        y - float value to be used to set the y-position of the diver
